Package com.company.Controller

Class RegistrationSystemController

java.lang.Object
com.company.Controller.RegistrationSystemController
public class RegistrationSystemController extends Object
the RegistrationSystemController class implements 2 sort methods 2 filter methods a register method that registers a student to a course a retrieveCoursesWithFreePlaces method that searches for courses with available places a deleteCourseByTeacher method that delete a course
Since:
1.0

    • register

      public boolean register(Student student, Course course)
      the methode registers a student to a curse, and adds the course to the students courses
      Parameters:
      student - - student to be registered for a course , student must not be null
      course - -course to which the student wants to register, course must not be null
      Returns:
      true- if the student was registered to the course or false - if there aren't places available for the course or if the student already has 30 credits

    • deleteCourseByTeacher

      public Course deleteCourseByTeacher(Course course, Teacher teacher, List<Student> studentsEnrolledForACourse)
      deletes a course (the course can be deleted just by a teacher)
      Parameters:
      course - -must not be null
      teacher - -must not be null
      Returns:
      course-if the course has been deleted or null if the course couldn't be found
